New Records: Rohit Sharma became the 3rd cricketer to get out in the 80s as many as 4 times in a calendar year in ODI cricket
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 87 against England in Lucknow
India posted 229 for 9 in 50 overs against England
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma emulated Kumar Sangakkara, out in the 80s for 4th time in 2023
Only two other batters have gotten out in 80s as many as 4 times in a calendar year in ODI cricket
Others: Rohit Sharma missed his 8th World Cup hundred by 13 runs
Rohit held the Indian innings together as wickets were falling around him with the top-order having a rare off day
